description.name: Piston for pneumatic grease pumps 12L and 15L
description.long_desc: Piston for pneumatic lubricators 12L and 15L is a spare part for pneumatic lubricators, which are used to lubricate machines and vehicles. It is responsible for generating pressure, which allows the grease to flow through the hose and nozzle. It is made of high-quality materials, which ensure its long life and resistance to wear.
description.short_desc: Piston for pneumatic lubricators 12L and 15L is a spare part for pneumatic lubricators, which are used to lubricate machines and vehicles. It is responsible for generating pressure, which allows the grease to flow through the hose and nozzle. It is made of high-quality materials, which ensure its long life and resistance to wear.
description.description: Piston for pneumatic lubricators 12L and 15L is a spare part for pneumatic lubricators, which are used to lubricate machines and vehicles. It is responsible for generating pressure, which allows the grease to flow through the hose and nozzle. It is made of high-quality materials, which ensure its long life and resistance to wear.

description.name: Brass combination padlock 21mm (4 digits)
description.long_desc:
A 4-Digit Combination Brass Padlock is a reliable tool that provides security and ease of use. With 10,000 possible combinations, this padlock guarantees the protection of your valuable items or property. Made of solid brass, it is not only durable but also aesthetically pleasing.


The features and advantages of this padlock include:



  • 10,000 combinations, ensuring a high level of security.

  • Brass construction, providing durability and resistance to weather conditions.

  • Shackle thickness of 3mm.


Examples of uses for the brass combination padlock include:



  • Securing bicycles, suitcases, or mailboxes.

  • Use in schools or gyms to secure personal lockers.

  • Application in warehouses or construction sites to secure tools and equipment.


This padlock is the perfect choice for those looking for an effective and easy-to-use solution to protect their valuable items.


Initial Code: 0000


To change the code, open the padlock using the initial code, then rotate it 180°, push it down, and set a new code relative to the red line next to the numbers.

description.name: 2.6m aluminum telescopic ladder 150kg
description.long_desc:
Telescopic aluminum ladder is a type of ladder that is structurally foldable and extendable, allowing for adjustment of its length according to needs. This means it can be easily stored and transported in a more compact form.


Material

Telescopic ladders are made of aluminum, making them lightweight yet corrosion-resistant.


Length Adjustment and Locking Mechanism

The telescopic ladder consists of sections that can be extended or retracted, allowing for length adjustment of the ladder. This makes the ladder versatile and adaptable to various tasks, such as working at different heights or in hard-to-reach areas. The ladder is equipped with locking mechanisms that hold the ladder sections in place, providing stability and safety during ladder use. This helps prevent accidental sliding of ladder sections.


Versatility

Telescopic ladders are commonly used for various purposes including construction work, roof repairs, gardening, or accessing hard-to-reach areas. They can be used both indoors and outdoors.


Technical Specifications

Product compliant with the PN-EN 131-6 standard.

























Height when unfolded260 cm
Height when folded74 cm
Distance between steps30 cm
Number of steps9
Maximum load capacity150 kg

description.name: 3.8m aluminum telescopic articulated ladder 150kg
description.long_desc:
An aluminum articulated telescopic ladder is an advanced version of a telescopic ladder, characterized by an additional articulating mechanism that allows it to be set in various shapes and positions. A telescopic aluminum ladder is a type of ladder that is structurally foldable and extendable, allowing for the adjustment of its length as needed. This means that it can be easily stored and transported in a more compact form.


Material

Telescopic ladders are made of aluminum, making them lightweight and corrosion-resistant.


Length Adjustment and Locking Mechanism

The telescopic ladder consists of sections that can be extended or retracted, enabling the adjustment of the ladder's length. This makes the ladder versatile and adaptable to various tasks, such as work at different heights or in hard-to-reach places. Additionally, in the articulated ladder, you can also manipulate the ladder's shape using articulating joints. It can be set at different angles or configured into shapes like the letter A, letter L, or other configurations, depending on your needs. The ladder is equipped with locking mechanisms that hold the ladder sections in place, ensuring stability and safety during use in various shapes and positions. These mechanisms allow you to lock the ladder into the chosen configuration, ensuring stability and preventing accidental section slippage.


Versatility

Articulated telescopic ladders are incredibly versatile and suitable for various applications. They can be used both as straight ladders to access different heights and as articulated ladders that facilitate access to hard-to-reach places and performing work at various levels. They can be used both indoors and outdoors.


Technical Specifications
























Height when extended380 cm (190 + 190 cm)
Height when folded85 cm
Distance between steps30 cm
Number of steps12 (6 + 6)
Maximum load capacity150 kg
description.short_desc:
An aluminum articulated telescopic ladder is an advanced version of a telescopic ladder, characterized by an additional articulating mechanism that allows it to be set in various shapes and positions. A telescopic aluminum ladder is a type of ladder that is structurally foldable and extendable, allowing for the adjustment of its length as needed. This means that it can be easily stored and transported in a more compact form.


Material

Telescopic ladders are made of aluminum, making them lightweight and corrosion-resistant.


Length Adjustment and Locking Mechanism

The telescopic ladder consists of sections that can be extended or retracted, enabling the adjustment of the ladder's length. This makes the ladder versatile and adaptable to various tasks, such as work at different heights or in hard-to-reach places. Additionally, in the articulated ladder, you can also manipulate the ladder's shape using articulating joints. It can be set at different angles or configured into shapes like the letter A, letter L, or other configurations, depending on your needs. The ladder is equipped with locking mechanisms that hold the ladder sections in place, ensuring stability and safety during use in various shapes and positions. These mechanisms allow you to lock the ladder into the chosen configuration, ensuring stability and preventing accidental section slippage.


Versatility

Articulated telescopic ladders are incredibly versatile and suitable for various applications. They can be used both as straight ladders to access different heights and as articulated ladders that facilitate access to hard-to-reach places and performing work at various levels. They can be used both indoors and outdoors.


Technical Specifications
























Height when extended380 cm (190 + 190 cm)
Height when folded85 cm
Distance between steps30 cm
Number of steps12 (6 + 6)
Maximum load capacity150 kg

description.name: Professional drill 150x800mm for earth auger
description.long_desc:
Professionally Designed Earth Auger Drill Bit - 150mm Diameter, 800mm Total Length


The professionally crafted earth auger drill bit with a 150mm working diameter and a total length of 800mm is an essential tool for those who require precise hole drilling for fence posts, poles, or other purposes. Its two-millimeter-thick sheet metal construction ensures not only durability but also efficiency during each use. The drill bit's tip features alternate blades, one flat and the other with three teeth, facilitating hole deepening when encountering natural obstacles like roots or stones.


This earth auger drill bit can be used for various purposes, including:



  • Drilling holes for fence posts, railings, or steel structures.

  • Tasks related to fence installation, structure assembly, or creating sturdy foundations.

  • Construction, gardening, and many other applications where precise holes are crucial.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: John Gardener

  • Working Diameter: 150mm

  • Total Length: 800mm

  • Mounting Hole Diameter: 20mm

  • Sheet Metal Thickness: 2mm

  • Double-blade design for easy drilling

  • Color: Orange

description.name: Metal pipe clamp with rubber 3/8" 15-19mm
description.long_desc:
Metal clamp with rubber is designed for securing pipes in water, sewage, heating, or gas installations. It provides stability, protects the pipes, and minimizes the impact of vibrations on the entire system.


The clamp is equipped with screws that allow adjustment and secure fastening of the clamp to the appropriate diameter of the pipe.


The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 3/8", corresponding to a range from 15 mm to 19 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.

description.long_desc:
Metal clamp with rubber is designed for securing pipes in water, sewage, heating, gas, and ventilation installations. It provides stability, protects the pipes, and minimizes the impact of vibrations on the entire system.


The clamp is equipped with screws that allow adjustment and secure fastening of the clamp to the appropriate diameter of the pipe.


The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 4", corresponding to a range from 107 mm to 112 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.

The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.
